sentence: One detail that caught our eye in Herschel Walkers fundraising report this week: His campaign paid Donald Trumps Mar-A-Lago resort roughly $135,000 in catering and venue fees last year.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Transgender sports ban introduced with high-powered support

sentence: In this years Senate race, the poll showed Republican Herschel Walker favored at 47% to Warnock at 44%, within the margin of error.
author: Mark Niesse
title: Sharp growth in Georgia voters alters landscape for 2022 elections

sentence: Brian Kemp and former football star Herschel Walker hope to win GOP majorities and clinch nominations for governor and U.S. senator on Tuesday without runoffs, with polls showing both men backed by more than 50% of voters.
title: Kemp and Walker look to victory in Georgia as primaries near

sentence: Their likely U.S. Senate candidate is Herschel Walker, whos Black.
title: Georgia voters showed us these 3 things about the fall election
